pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() wild 8, tamed 20 $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 3 on easy, 4 on normal, 6 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Neutral  $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Taigas, Grove, Forest$(br)> $(n)Taming:$() Bones   $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() Meat    $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Hunts $(l:creatures/undead-skeleton)$(thing)Skeletons$(), $(l:creatures/animal-sheep)$(thing)Sheeps$(), $(l:creatures/animal-rabbit)$(thing)Rabbits$(), $(l:creatures/animal-fox)$(thing)Foxes$() and $(l:creatures/aquatic_animal-turtle)$(thing)Baby Turtles$().
